metadata.name: The Last Dance
metadata.description:
The Last Dance  
A performance by duo Hibis & Venus

This piece is a celebration of

- The closing of year 2022  
- The welcoming of 2023  
- Christmas  
- A new Year  
- My new creative direction

The piece features a duet of two Hybriders performing 'The Last Dance'. A demonstration of the breadth of my new art line embellished with subtle green & red Christmas (but not too Christmassy) spirit, but also adapted for being suited to see in the new year and all festivities in between.

2022 has unquestionably been the most difficult year of my entire life and what better to end it with a celebratory dance performance created through art.

Further, I wanted to articulate the potential evolution of my new art line to show the flexibility of how it could expand and evolve from the initial Hybriders Series and still maintain recognisable consistency and a very distinct signature.

I hope you enjoy it.

Thank you 


Hand drawn on Procreate  
5400 x 7200 pix @150 dpi
